data.name: Fall Tower
data.detailed_description:
I made a 2D action game. Aim for the top of the tower with a height of 1000m.
The player is constantly moving and flips left and right when hitting a wall. Jump in a timely manner and aim for the top.
Once you go to the point where the flag is, you will be able to return there immediately.

【Method of operation】

Only jumps. You can switch between jumping with the "jump button" or "tap the screen" in the settings. In the case of "jump button", you can change the position of the button in the settings. You can also jump with the space key.
You can quickly return to the location of the flag once you have passed it with the button.

data.short_description: 2D action game that aims to go up

mac_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Sierra 10.12.6 from
  • Processor: SSE2
  • Graphics: Metal-enabled Intel and AMD GPUs
  • Storage: 50 MB available space

linux_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Ubuntu 16.04、Ubuntu 18.04、CentOS 7
  • Processor: SSE2
  • Graphics: OpenGL 3.2 以降か Vulkan 対応の NVIDIA と AMD GPU
  • Storage: 50 MB available space
